class IndexLabel[source]

IndexLabel(labelpath:Union[str, Path])

Support working with label files of PDS Index tables.

Parameters:

  • labelpath : typing.Union[str, pathlib.Path]

    Path to the labelfile for a PDS Indexfile. The actual table should reside in the same folder to be automatically parsed when calling the `read_index_data` method.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

index_to_df[source]

index_to_df(indexpath:Union[str, Path], label:IndexLabel, convert_times=True)

The main reader function for PDS Indexfiles.

In conjunction with an IndexLabel object that figures out the column widths, this reader should work for all PDS TAB files.

Parameters:

  • indexpath : typing.Union[str, pathlib.Path]

    Path to the index TAB file

  • label : <class 'planetarypy.pds.utils.IndexLabel'>

    Label object that has both the column names and the columns widths as attributes 'colnames' and 'colspecs'

  • convert_times : <class 'bool'>, optional

    Switch to control if to convert columns with "TIME" in name (unless COUNT is as well in name) to datetime

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

decode_line[source]

decode_line(linedata:str, labelpath:Union[str, Path])

Decode one line of tabbed data with the appropriate label file.

  • linedata : <class 'str'>

    One line of a .tab data file

  • labelpath : typing.Union[str, pathlib.Path]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

find_mixed_type_cols[source]

find_mixed_type_cols(df:DataFrame, fix:bool=True)

For a given dataframe, find the columns that are of mixed type.

Tool to help with the performance warning when trying to save a pandas DataFrame as a HDF. When a column changes datatype somewhere, pickling occurs, slowing down the reading process of the HDF file.

Parameters:

  • df : <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>

    Dataframe to be searched for mixed data-types

  • fix : <class 'bool'>, optional

    Switch to control if NaN values in these problem columns should be replaced by the string 'UNKNOWN'

Returns:

  • <class 'list'>

    List of column names that have data type changes within themselves.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fix_hirise_edrcumindex[source]

fix_hirise_edrcumindex(infname:Union[str, Path], outfname:Union[str, Path])

Fix HiRISE EDRCUMINDEX.

The HiRISE EDRCUMINDEX has some broken lines where the SCAN_EXPOSURE_DURATION is of format F10.4 instead of the defined F9.4. This function simply replaces those incidences with one less decimal fraction, so 20000.0000 becomes 20000.000.

Parameters:

  • infname : typing.Union[str, pathlib.Path]

    Path to broken EDRCUMINDEX.TAB

  • outfname : typing.Union[str, pathlib.Path]

    Path where to store the fixed TAB file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
